thread.title: Ten years after crash, Americans still wary of stocks

title: Ten years after crash, Americans still wary of stocks
text:
Ten years after crash, Americans still wary of stocks 3:35am IST - 01:41 
Ten years after the start of the financial crisis that erased $16.4 trillion in assets from U.S. households, Americans have yet to embrace the U.S. stock market with the same fervor as before ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
